about_the_game:
Vlad awakens after years of sleep to find his possessions have been stolen... And now he wants them back!

A few days before that however, a group of Very Important People arrive at the quiet town of Faptonbury to see the Mayor about a newly found artifact.

This is a demo to show the progress of Dead of Night Revamped, a remake of the original Dead of Night that is being made to address various issues with the first game and to expand upon the idea. This demo is only a taste of what is to come.


And a big thanks to Jonathan Temples for the font!
